feed.title: Hermosawave Photography
feed.subtitle: A series of daily landscape photographs by Daniel Sofer, 20 years running.

entry.title: Farmers Market
entry.content:
The Original Farmers Market - on Fairfax Blvd. in Los Angeles - was originally the home of Gilmore Oil Company. Here, the Gilmore gas station mascot with the checkered flag is waving down the lanterns for the upcoming Chinese New Year. ğŸ˜€

entry.title: Brush Creek

entry.title: Through The Tower
entry.content:
Sun sets through the lifeguard tower on Eighth Street in Hermosa Beach.

As another year comes to an end, I'd like to wish everyone a happy and prosperous 2023. Thanks for being with me on this photographic journey of over twenty years.

ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ•ã‚¬ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚¿ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã«æ²ˆã‚€å¤•æ—¥ ä»Šå¹´ã‚‚ä¸€å¹´ãŒçµ‚ã‚ã‚Šã€2023å¹´ãŒçš†æ§˜ã«ã¨ã£ã¦å¹¸ã›ã§è±Šã‹ãªå¹´ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã‚ˆã†ã«ãŠç¥ˆã‚Šç”³ã—ä¸Šã’ã¾ã™ã€‚20å¹´ä»¥ä¸Šã«ã‚ãŸã‚‹å†™çœŸã®æ—…ã«ãŠä»˜ãåˆã„ã„ãŸã ãã€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨ã†ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
